me.title: About me
me.description: I am a developer who enjoys creating functional and effective web solutions. I seek challenges that allow me to transform ideas into concrete and useful projects while improving my skills and learning new tools and technologies. In my free time, I enjoy playing video games, watching series and movies, going out, and playing guitar.
